name: Sourdough Bread
description: Our classic sourdough bread is made with a wild yeast starter and slow fermentation for a tangy and chewy texture.

name: Baguette
description: Our crispy baguette is perfect for sandwiches or dipping into olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

name: Croissant
description: Our flaky and buttery croissants are perfect for breakfast or as a snack.
